attributes.action: Close special schools alongside all other schools in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: To keep everyone safe from COVID 19
attributes.background: Only open special schools to key workers children and those at risk at home

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567579

During the current lockdown the Government has stated that colleges, primary (reception onwards) and secondary schools will remain open for vulnerable children and the children of critical workers only: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home#going-to-school-or-college
